title: The misery of a deserted people opened in a sermon preached at Pauls before the Lord Major, aldermen, and Common-Councel, Decemb. 2, 1659, being a day of solemn humiliation by them appointed / by Edward Reynolds ...
author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Ratcliffe for George Thomason ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
